eu.liveandgov.ar.utilities
Class Graphic_Utils

java.lang.Object
  eu.liveandgov.ar.utilities.Graphic_Utils

public class Graphic_Utils
extends Object

Generate the billboard texture. It is a bitmap that it is glued on a rectangle geometry on AR.

Author:
Dimitrios Ververidis for the Multimedia Group (http://mklab.iti.gr).

billboard_W

public static int billboard_W
billboard texture size: 256x128. To be sure use only powers of 2. Keep low to save memory

Create the texture to dress the billboard.

Parameters:
billBoardTitle - : Text of the title
distSTR - : Text of the distance
bmicon - : icon as bitmap
Returns:
